meanings.sent1: She decided to forgoing dessert to save room for the main course.
meanings.sent2: I am forgoing my usual coffee in the morning to try out herbal tea.
meanings.sent3: The cat was forgoing its nap in favor of chasing a butterfly around the garden.
meanings.sent4: The team captain made the tough decision of forgoing his own glory for the success of the team.
meanings.sent5: By forgoing short-term pleasures, she was able to achieve her long-term goals.

meanings.sent1: The forgoing chapter in the book provided important background information.
meanings.sent2: The forgoing week had been filled with unexpected challenges.
meanings.sent3: The forgoing guests at the party left behind a trail of confetti and laughter.
meanings.sent4: The forgoing events set the stage for the exciting climax of the story.
meanings.sent5: The forgoing discussions laid the foundation for the final decision.
